short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension to close tabs left open by applications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Some links create a temporary tab to finally launch a desktop application leaving that tab open.

This happens for applications like ZOOM and LINEAR and many others.
This extension will close that tab once the application is launched.
